channel.title: 0.9.9 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Dead players now have ghost textures. Spooky! * Added a room for the Princess and Fool. * If a player is inactive for 2 days, they will be killed. * 6 new executions have been added. * 4 new armors have been added. * If the game freezes, it should return everyone to the main menu. * Updated some in-game UI elements.
## Weapons: * Heaven's Sword (Holy Strike) * Abaddon Axe (Hell's Fury) * Warden's Bludgeon (Clobber) * Vortex Amulet (Energy Flux) * Frozen Rune (Conjure Ice) * Rune of Focus (Ahemak Blast)
## Armor/Skins: * Drake-Hide Leather Tunic (Working Now) * Basalt Armament * Noble's Gown * Crimson Regalia
## Alchemist: * Can no longer target king with Emerald Potion.
## Court Wizard:
* Magical Barrier still had the old description for the ability. Now correctly states, "Protects a player from negative effects tonight. Does not block kills or converts."
## Drunk: * Happy Hour now makes both the Drunk and his target immune to conversion for the night. * Debauchery will not force the Cult Leader or Mastermind to convert you.
## Hunter: * Spike Traps makes the Hunter immune to conversion for the night.
## Possessor: * Now appears as Possessor if they die. * Can no longer possess player if they were killed by someone else that night. * Poison and bleed from the Possessor's victim will affect the Possessor while they are in that body.
## Scorned: * Can now only start with Blue Dragon targets. * Will commit suicide if all targets die, without winning. * Targets has been reduced to 2.
## Sheriff: * Scout is now a day ability.
## Improvements: * New users no longer need to activate emails. Yes!! This may change, but hopefully not :) * Text in the login screen and lobby has been upscaled. * Some gfx polish in the lobby. * Friends list now reflects your selected title, although there's only 1 right now except for staff. * Friends list now reflects your selected avatar, although... ^
## Changes: * We ditched a crappy data system and swapped to a new one with TONS of potential new features. This means a few things have reset. Please keep an eye out for new bugs. * You will be asked again for your email. You DONT need to activate it! * Your gp and inventory has reset -- but here's 300gp on us! * Friends list has had a complete revamp. You can't interact with people, yet, but soon you'll be able to to interact without Steam, approve/deny/request friends, and more! * We now track name change history: Watch out! Better not to troll at all. * Soon, you won't be able to play if you use a proxy to hide your IP to avoid IP bans. If this is an issue in your country, private message Xblade.
## Bug Fixes: * Possessor bug fixes. * Scorned bug fixes. * Tons of bug fixes that froze you at "verifying version" due to our old friends list * Private matches should now HIDE the vote change host button * Public matches should now SHOW the vote change host button * Friends list is no longer buggy (although temporarily downgraded) * Drake-Hide Leather Tunic should now work in-game. * Others.
